Headline: #52 Kedzie/California and # 52A South Kedzie Temporary Reroute at Kedzie/54th
ShortDescription: #52 Kedzie/California and # 52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, 51st, California, 55th & Kedzie, due to police activity near Kedzie/54th

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
52 Kedzie/California and # 52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Kedzie, 51st, California, 55th, then resume their normal route on Kedzie, due to police activity near Kedzie/54th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #119 Michigan/119th Temporary Reroute near 119th/Wallace
ShortDescription: #119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to fire department activity near 119th/Wallace.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to fire department activity near 119th/Wallace.

Northbound buses will operate via 119th, Halsted 120th, Parnell, then resume their normal route.

Southbound buses will operate via 119th, Wallace, 120th, then resume their normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: #22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont,  due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Clark, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

#152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted, then resume their normal route on Addison, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.
